hero.title: Databricks: The Data Intelligence Platform
hero.description:
Unified Data & AI capabilities.

Databricks offers a unified platform for data, analytics and AI.

With the Data Intelligence Platform, Databricks democratizes insights to everyone in an organization. Built on an open lakehouse architecture, the Data Intelligence Platform provides a unified foundation for all data and governance, combined with AI models tuned to an organizationâ€™s unique characteristics.

sections.title: Building the data foundations
sections.content: Unlocking AI power starts by setting up the right foundations and making your data AI-ready. This means ingesting all the relevant data into the unified data platform, from various sources (files, operational databases, APIs, etc.), and processing it into curated data products, using Dabaricks capabilities:
highlights: Ingestion, processing & orchestration pipelines with Lakeflow

sections.title: Unlocking value at every level
sections.content: Use the prepared data to build advanced descriptive analytics (what happened), as well predictive ML models and advanced AI agents, using tools built on top of your data (Bring the AI to your data, not the other way around).
highlights: AI Agents (root cause, how to respond, etc.)

sections.title: The Databricks Advantage
sections.content: Databricks provides the foundational infrastructure for building production-grade AI applications. From data ingestion to model serving, everything runs on a single, governed platform that scales with your needs.
highlights: Agent Bricks: the fastest way to build agents
MLflow for experiment tracking and quality monitoring
Unity Catalog for governance and security

sections.title: Power AI with tools
sections.content: From retrieving relevant knowledge from PDFs to querying databases and APIs, tools are the key to getting more opertaional value from your AI agents.
